snippet: The all-cash acquisition of Chemlogics looks expensive, but there should be tax savings, a sales increase and a chance to ride the shale revolution, the author contends.
abstract: The all-cash acquisition of Chemlogics looks expensive, but there should be tax savings, a sales increase and a chance to ride the shale revolution, the author contends.

headline.main: Solvay Pays Up to Get Into Fracking
